response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence that promises to enhance your life in numerous ways. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $10,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this remarkable product.", "product_price": 9500}
